Several bilateral agreements are expected to be signed, charting a roadmap for future collaboration until 2030.

description: A chilling child murder spree has been uncovered in Haryana, with a 34-year-old woman, Poonam, confessing to drowning at least four children, including her own toddler son. Driven by an urge to kill children more attractive than her own, she meticulously staged the deaths as accidents. The latest victim was a six-year-old girl at a wedding.

title: Gurgaon hit-&-run: Bizman mowed down by speeding car while cycling; CCTV footage emerges
description: A 58-year-old cyclist was fatally struck by a car in Gurgaon's DLF 2. The hit-and-run incident occurred during his routine morning ride, with CCTV footage identifying the vehicle. Police are actively tracing the owner for arrest, while the community raises concerns about road safety within residential areas.

title: Kobe Bryant slammed by alleged friend, claims he 'wasn’t a good person'
description: New claims suggest NBA legend Kobe Bryant was not a good person and neglected family and friends. An alleged childhood friend shared disappointment over unmet promises of support. This contrasts with Kobe's documented generosity and mentorship. The allegations have sparked debate online, highlighting the complex nature of his legacy. Kobe's life included both personal challenges and significant positive contributions.

title: Jeff Bezos' ex-wife cut her Amazon stake to donate millions of dollars
description: MacKenzie Scott, Jeff Bezos' ex-wife, has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, donating billions to diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. Her recent $80 million gift to Howard University highlights her focus on substantial contributions to DEI and disaster relief. Scott's philanthropic efforts continue to impact numerous causes, solidifying her position as a top global philanthropist.

title: 10 foods that boost liver health, reduce fat and improve function
description: Nourishing your liver is crucial for overall health, and diet plays a significant role. This article explores ten scientifically backed foods, including coffee, green tea, and fatty fish, that can help reduce inflammation, protect against fat accumulation, and improve liver enzymes. Incorporating these nutrient-dense options supports the liver's vital functions.

title: Cardi B shares sweet glimpse of newborn son, calls him her ‘cuddle buddy’
description: Cardi B is embracing motherhood again, sharing tender moments with her newborn son and boyfriend Stefon Diggs on Instagram. The rapper also offered glimpses of her other children, Kulture, Wave, and Blossom, highlighting the joys and realities of family life. This new chapter signifies personal growth and a continued commitment to her artistic career.

title: Warriors linked to $27M Mavericks star as support for Curry; Hield seen as key asset
description: Golden State Warriors and Dallas Mavericks are reportedly considering a straightforward trade: Buddy Hield for Naji Marshall. This move addresses roster imbalances, with the Warriors seeking defensive wing depth and the Mavericks aiming to boost floor spacing around their stars. Both teams could benefit from a fresh start and improved team dynamics.

title: MLB trade rumors: Cubs poised to land $400M Tigers Cy Young winner in mega deal
description: The Chicago Cubs are reportedly considering a blockbuster trade for Detroit Tigers ace Tarik Skubal, a two-time Cy Young winner, to fill the void left by Kyle Tucker's expected free agency departure. This move would create a formidable pitching duo with rookie Cade Horton and signal a serious World Series push for the Cubs.
